scripts.codegen:rinkeby: npm run prepare:rinkeby && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/ subgraph.rinkeby.yaml
scripts.build:rinkeby: npm run codegen:rinkeby && graph build subgraph.rinkeby.yaml
scripts.deploy:hosting:rinkeby: npm run build:rinkeby && graph deploy --product hosted-service ddevkim/omnuum subgraph.rinkeby.yaml
